Grave Chill.name: Grave Chill
Grave Chill.flavor: When the dead fall, you speed their souls to the Shadowfell.
Grave Chill.trigger: An ally within range of you bloodies an enemy with an attack
Grave Chill.effect: You shift to a square adjacent to the target and make a burst 1 attack.
Grave Chill.attack: Strength, Wisdom, or Charisma vs. Fortitude
Grave Chill.onHit: The target is dazed and immobilized until the end of your next turn.

Call of Letherna.name: Call of Letherna
Call of Letherna.flavor: A frigid wind moans as it swirls around you, bringing with it the malign atmosphere found only in the Raven Queen’s demesne.
Call of Letherna.attack: Strength, Wisdom, or Charisma vs. Will
Call of Letherna.onHit: 4d6 + Strength, Wisdom, or Charisma modifier cold and necrotic damage, and you pull the target 4 squares.
Call of Letherna.effect: The burst creates a zone of killing cold that lasts until the end of your next turn. Any creature that starts its turn within the zone is slowed until the end of its next turn, and it takes 10 cold and necrotic damage.
Call of Letherna.sustainMinor: The zone persists, and you pull each enemy within the zone 1 square toward the origin of the zone’s burst.
Call of Letherna.special: When you gain this power, choose Strength, Wisdom, or Charisma as the ability you use when making attack rolls and damage rolls with this power.

Fated Outcome.name: Fated Outcome
Fated Outcome.flavor: All has been foreseen because each outcome has already unfolded in the Raven Queen’s eyes.
Fated Outcome.trigger: One ally within range of you misses on an attack roll, fails a saving throw, or fails a skill check.
Fated Outcome.effect: The ally rerolls the attack roll, the saving throw, or the skill check, adding your Strength, Wisdom, or Charisma modifier to it.
Fated Outcome.special: When you gain this power, choose Strength, Wisdom, or Charisma as the ability you use with this power.
